desc: Conscious Water is a 100% natural flower essence for water, that when added to water, makes a refreshing drink that adds a bit of aspiration to your day.

layout.text:
Conscious Water are the world’s
first
flower essences for water

Feeling uplifted and balanced can be as simple as drinking a glass of Conscious Water.
Our unique flower essences come as six subtly flavoured positive
Intentions in individual sachets: Love, Happiness, Sweet Dreams, Rejuvenation, Clarity, and Serenity.
